item.title: Interview for SFU Economics
item.description: Video link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3XHmHwyeWbA&t=2s&ab_channel=SFUEconomics I was asked to do an interview with my former advisor from my days of being an economics student at SFU. I covered a variety of topics, including: Graduation and your first job Using LinkedIn to reach out to people Utilizing a university email Leaning on resources such as professors and advisors Working as a Data Analyst The project lifecycle: Working with stakeholders Gathering data to analyze Doing the analysis Presenting while being an introvert Adhoc requests and how to handle them
